Class Jpmobile::Mobile::Jphone
In: lib/jpmobile/mobile/softbank.rb
Parent: Vodafone

SoftBank 2G携帯電話(J-PHONE/Vodafone 2G)

スーパクラスはVodafone。

Methods

position   supports_cookie?  

Constants

USER_AGENT_REGEXP = /^(J-PHONE|J-EMULATOR)/   対応するUser-Agentの正規表現

Public Instance methods

position()

位置情報があれば Position のインスタンスを返す。無ければ nil を返す。

[Source]

89:       return nil if str.nil? || str == "0000000%1A0000000%1A%88%CA%92%75%8F%EE%95%F1%82%C8%82%B5"
90:       raise "unsuppoted format" unless str =~ /^(\d\d)(\d\d)(\d\d)%1A(\d\d\d)(\d\d)(\d\d)%1A(.+)$/
91:       pos = Jpmobile::Position.new
92:       pos.lat = Jpmobile::Position.dms2deg($1,$2,$3)
93:       pos.lon = Jpmobile::Position.dms2deg($4,$5,$6)
94:       pos.options = {"address"=>CGI.unescape($7).toutf8}
